definition: one and only (idiom); rarely seen/unique of its kind
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
variant of 絕|绝[jue2]
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
barely/only/merely
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Examples of demonization of homosexuality is not unique in history.
sentences.chinese: 将同性恋妖魔化的事例在历史上并非绝无仅有。

sentences.english: It is the only case of that kind I ever heard of.
sentences.chinese: 这是我听到的同类情况中绝无仅有的。

sentences.english: In other words, we are the only ones with anything to offer.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，我们是绝无仅有的供方。

sentences.english: This is the only zero-emission car on the market.
sentences.chinese: 这是现在市场上绝无仅有的“零排放”车型。

sentences.english: Toys “R” Us’s frustration is not unique.
sentences.chinese: 玩具反斗城的挫折并非绝无仅有。

sentences.english: It is unparallel in the scripture where there is such emphasis on joy.
sentences.chinese: 在经文的描述中，这样重复地强调欢乐是绝无仅有的。

sentences.english: The  most  special  feeling  of  human  is  the  blind  love. That's  the  unique.
sentences.chinese: 人类的感情最特别的就是单恋，那是绝无仅有的。

sentences.english: Never again will the automotive industry experience this kind of growth.
sentences.chinese: 体验这种增长是汽车行业绝无仅有的机会。

sentences.english: The most special feeling of human is the blind love.
sentences.chinese: 人类的感情最特别的就是单恋，那是绝无仅有的。

sentences.english: Each storm provides a remarkable drama, one without parallel in nature.
sentences.chinese: 每次暴风雨都是一次大自然的绝无仅有的精彩演出。

sentences.english: 5The most special feeling of human is the blind love. That's the unique.
sentences.chinese: 5人类的感情最特别的就是单恋，那是绝无仅有的。

definition: unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique
unique and unmatched (idiom); unrivalled/nothing compares with it
to surpass all others of its kind before and since/to have neither predecessors nor successors
pinyin: qian2 wu2 gu3 ren2 hou4 wu2 lai2 zhe3

definition: to rarely have/rare
rarely seen
unrivaled (idiom); world number one/unique/unequaled
unprecedented in history
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
rare/rarely seen
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
pioneering work
matchless/without equal/there is nothing better
can be rated as/can be said to be
rare/infrequent
lit. as rare as phoenix feathers and unicorn horns (idiom)/fig. few and far between
reckoned to be first or second best (idiom)/one of the very best/to list one by one
